tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robots (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  total_score INT DEFAULT 0,
  matches_played INT DEFAULT 0
)

CREATE TABLE robots (robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 score INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Robots (   robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   robot_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   team_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   score DECIMAL NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Matches (   match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   match_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,   winner_robot_id UUID NOT NULL,   loser_robot_id UUID NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Teams (   team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   team_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Rankings (   ranking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   team_id UUID NOT NULL,   ranking_position INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    judge_id INT,
    round_number INT,
    points_awarded INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES Judges(judge_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Rankings (
    rank_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    total_points INT,
    ranking_position INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Teams(team_id)
);
